g.id AS linkId, g.title AS linkTitle, g.link_type AS linkType, g.link_url AS linkUrl, g.topic_id AS topicId, g.parameter AS parameter, g.sort AS linkSort,
e.role_name AS userRole, a.STATUS AS STATUS, a.contact AS contact, a.site AS Site, a.topic_type AS topicType, a.hot_reply AS hotReply, a.praise_count AS praiseCount, a.star_count AS starCount, a.region_code AS regionCode, a.region_full_name AS regionFullName, f.realname AS realname, f.avatar AS avatar, f.sex AS sex FROM ( SELECT id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, class_code, speciai_id, title, content, enabled, hits_count, reply_count, replied_by, replied_time, icon_id, del_flag, STATUS, contact, site, topic_type, hot_reply, praise_count, star_count, region_code, region_full_name, public_time, edit_time, sys_org_code FROM bbs_topic WHERE status = 1
